My Timeline of Experience

Vicha Pratummanee

  • JUL 2019 - MAY 2020: Global Business Travel Company

    - Maintain accounting schedules and prepare daily accounting duties and handle oversea remittance and cheque payment. To assist any administrative support for reissue payment to airline companys and clients.
    - Back office support role include activities such as manual invoicing, collect record of WHT & VAT input for preparing to Revenue Department- Prepare support document for refund processing and reconciling hard copy invoices, client billing , settlement support

  • MAR 2017 - JUN 2019: GO365 Travel co.,th

    - Prepares work to be accomplished by gathering and sorting documents and related information.
    - To pay invoices by verifying transaction information scheduling and preparing disbursements, obtained authorization of payment.- To obtains revenues by verifying transaction information, computing charges and refunds.
    - preparing and mailing invoices, identifying delinquent accounts and insufficient payments.
    - To collect revenues by reminding delinquent accounts and notifying customers of insufficient payments.

  • OCT 2016 - FEB 2017: G4S Security Services co.,ltd)

    - Planning invoicing with necessary supporting documentation.Printing, sending and tracking status of invoices.
    - Clarifying invoices with supporting documents.
    - Updating the invoicing database-prepare tax report for manager and handling daily or weekly invoicing and revenue reports.

  • OCT 2011 - SEP 2016: Postman

    - Check a accuracy of letters and parcels from in country and outside the country and sorting mails follow area that responsibility
    - record information for sending letters and parcels by computer- Delivery letters and parcels follow area that responsibility- Check recipients to be identified .
    - Record information by computer.- Send paper document to Supervisors daily

  • OCT 2008 - OCT 2011: Auditer (merchandise)

    - To check sales on machine together with staffs before counting products - use counting machine to physically count products in a sale area such as products for consumers and prepaid phone cards
    - To check cash balance in saving with the branch manager and checking sales after counting in a sales area and physically count inventory in stock
    - Summarize result towards the branch manager and reporting the summarized result to head office by online
